member.name: DirectX.GradientMeshPatch
member.summary: Creates a structure that contains the given control points, colors, and boundary flags.
member.param: The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 00.
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 01.
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 02.

Specifies how to render the top edge of the mesh.
Specifies how to render the left edge of the mesh.

member.name: DirectX.InkBezierSegment
member.param: The first control point for the Bezier segment.
The second control point for the Bezier segment.
The end point for the Bezier segment.

member.name: DirectX.InkPoint
member.param: The x and y coordinates of the point.
The radius of this point. Corresponds to the width of the ink stroke at this point in the stroke.

member.name: DirectX.InkStyleProperties
member.param: The pre-transform shape of the nib (pen tip) used to draw a given ink object.
The transform applied to the nib. Note that the translation components of the transform matrix are ignored for the purposes of rendering.
